name: Mystery Solitaire. Cthulhu Mythos 3
description:
Do you hear that call? It's Cthulhu inviting you to play a new solitaire game!

200 game levels in 20 game locations. Collect cards in sequence to get to the special cards that will help you advance further.

- Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards!
- Exciting levels that won't let you get bored!
- Pick cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the combo multiplier,
That gives you more coins!
- Original themed decks and 9 card shirt styles!
